sentence.Network_en: I'm a bit of a boor, so I hope you won't mind if I speak bluntly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是一个粗人,说话直来直去, 你可别见怪.

sentence.Network_en: " Oh, the man's impossible -- an ill - bred boor,'said Scarlett.
sentence.Network_cn: " 唔, 刚才这个人太差劲 ---- 是个没教养的东西, "思嘉说.

sentence.Network_en: If he fears the intellectual, he despises the boor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对知识分子有戒心, 但是更瞧不起乡下人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... boong 原住民 boor 农民 boorish 农民的.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... boon ? n. 恩惠, 福利 boor ? n. 迟钝的人, 粗野的人 bootless ? adj. 无用的.
粗字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 粗浅〖 simple;shallow;superficial〗 粗人〖 boor〗 粗涩〖 rough〗.
赵丽词汇5500笔记 - 豆丁网 ... patent 专利 02-3 boor 不解风情的人 idiot 白痴.

list.abs: Don ' t be such a boor !, 不要这样粗鲁!
MacIntyre Dixon Bartender迈克儿·德雷尔 Bar boorAl Fann Voice of Sam
莽汉 in English, translation,... ... 莽 impertinent 莽汉 ;a boor;a fool 南汉 Southern Han.
an uncouth , crude , or ill-bred person ; a boor .粗人笨拙的、粗鲁的或无教养的人；举止粗鲁的人
...somnia失眠 rabies狂犬病 leprosy麻风病 pneumonia肺炎 diabetes四大粗人：lout churl boor yokellout：brutish 残暴的；awkward 笨拙的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'peasant'): from Low German būr or Dutch boer 'farmer'

entry.tran: 粗野无礼的人；无教养的人
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a boor, you think their behaviour and attitudes are rough, uneducated, and rude.

means.word_mean: 1. a crude uncouth ill-bred person lacking culture or refinement

auth_sentence.content: Still, it's hard to escape the conclusion that Philip is simply the standard boor.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, it's hard to escape the conclusion that Philip is simply the standard boor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, it's hard to escape the conclusion that Philip is simply the standard boor.

auth_sentence.content: His son was portrayed as a boor on the front page of the Wall Street Journal.
auth_sentence.res_content: His son was portrayed as a boor on the front page of the Wall Street Journal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His son was portrayed as a boor on the front page of the Wall Street Journal.

sentences.en: She has thrown herself away upon that boor from sheer ignorance that better individuals existed!
sentences.cn: 只因为她全然不知道天下还有更好的人，她就嫁给了那个乡下佬！
